text: Poshlaja Molly (rus. Пошлая Молли, translate as Vulgar Molly) - ukrainian rock-band from Zmiuov, Ukraine. Kirill Timoshenko (Kirill Bledny, lead singer of band) made band in 2016. The band is one of popular synth-punk bands in Ukraine, combining pop-punk with electronic music. History. Kirill Timoshenko, the creator of the band, was born in Zmiev, Ukraine on March 31, 1997. The band has formed in February 2016. On February 24, 2017, the debut music album with eight tracks was released with the title "8 sposobov brosit' drochit" (8 ways to stop jerking off), which quickly gained popularity in the social network "VKontakte". On June 9, 2017, the band released their first music video for the song "Lubimaya Pesnya Tvoei Sestry" ("Your Sister's Favorite Song"), which received several million views on YouTubea>. The video was produced by Yana Kryukova. On January 29, 2018, a six-track EP titled "Grustnaya Devchonka S Glazami Kak U Sobaki" ("Sad Girl with Dog Eyes") was released. A few days later, the music video for the song "Tipichnaya Vecherinka S Basseinom) ("Typical Pool Party") was releaseda>, which was later deleted in 2020. The video was produced by Yana Kryukova again. In the spring of the same year, the video for the song Vse Khotyat Menya Pocelovat" ("Everyone Wants To Kiss Me") was released, which was also later deleted.On November 23, 2018, a four-track EP titled "Ochen Strashnaya Molly 3 (Chast' 1)" ("Very Scary Molly 3 (Part 1)") was released. In December, the music video for the song "CTRL+Zzz" was released, which was later deleted. The video was produced by Yana Kryukova too. In 2019, the music video "LOL" was released. Maxim Balter and Nikita Kvasnikov became the producers of the video. On February 18, 2020, six-track EP "Paycheck" was released. It included the single "Mishka" (Bruin) featuring KATERINA. Maxim Balter and Nikita Kvasnikov became the producers of the music video of Mishka. On May 15, 2020, a video clip for the song "Ty Razbila Papiny Mashinu" ("You've Broken Dad's Car") with the participation of HOFFMANITA was released, the video was produced by Yana Kryukova.
